#### Note:

To get the above line-up of images I added some style code to the site css:

```html
 <style>
 #images  {
	 width: 1250px;
	 height: 300px;
 }
 #images img {
	 float: left;
	 width: auto;
	 height: 160px;
	 margin: 0 0 0 15px;
 }
</style>
```

The images are then put in `<div>` elements and are linked via Markdown:

```html
<div id="images">
```
